short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test your regular expressions in javascript. Features: Live results, replace matches, color highlights and saving state.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reggie is here to help you test your regular expressions in javascript. Features include: Live results, replace matches,  and change color highlights. If you need to go to a new window Reggie has your back and will remember what you typed last so you don't lose your place.
